timeline.message:
Skip looking up duties when there are no validators.
Add debug logging to show the known validator indices.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into tidy-up-rest-client

timeline.bodyText: we want our own copy of standard codes?
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: Struggling to find a better source for them.  I don't really want to pull the whole servlet API into the Validator Client for instance as it has nothing to do with servlets.
replies.author: ajsutton
